long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Threpsi Ad is an extension that displays ads at the bottom of your screen. These ads are discreet so as not to bother!

The central idea of ​​Threpsi Ad is based on the fact that through our daily habit we can generate income to help a professional or social group.

This revenue is generated by the ads that are displayed on your screen!

Consider that many of us use the internet daily. So for as long as we surf, discreet ads can be displayed at the bottom of our screen, which we do not need to click! Ads generate profit when they simply appear on the screen (CPM ads)!

So, by making it a daily habit (like surfing the internet) we help a social group financially without being asked to pay any money!
